3.7kW

£779 Full price

£279 With OLEV Grant

10x faster than a 13A plug.

  • Provides an EV 15 miles of range per hour (RPH)*
  • Compatible with all plug-in vehicles (available with type 1 or type 2 connector)
  • Available as Universal or Fixed Cable.
  • Requires three phase power

£359 With OLEV Grant

3x faster than a 13A plug.

  • Provides an EV 15 miles of range per hour (RPH)*
  • Compatible with all plug-in vehicles (available with type 1 or type 2 connector)
  • Available as Universal or Fixed Cable.
  • Requires three phase power

£999 With OLEV Grant

10x faster than a 13A plug.

  • Provides an EV 15 miles of range per hour (RPH)*
  • Compatible with all plug-in vehicles (available with type 1 or type 2 connector)
  • Compatible with Tethered Units Only.
  • Requires three phase power

4.8/5 star rating, from 1965 reviews on:

Claiming the OLEV EV.H.S Grant

The OLEV grant allows you to reduce the cost of your homecharger by £500. If you qualify for the grant, POD Point will take care of the claim on your behalf. Click here for more information.

Eligibilty checklist:

  • You have off street parking.
  • Your plug-in vehicle was purchased after April 2015.
  • You have not already claimed the grant for your vehicle.
  • By claiming the grant, you are not going above the limit of two OLEV funded chargepoints per household.

90% of our customers are eligible for free installation

What to expect on the day of your installation

Your homecharger will be installed by a certified POD Point expert installers.

Demonstration

Thousands of hours of experience installing chargepoints. Experienced City & Guilds accredited electricians. Specially trained on plug-in vehicles and how to charge them.

Pre-arrival

Your expert will confirm their arrival time with you in advance of the installation.

Pre-installation

Your expert will find the best position for your charger based on your power supply and how you park your car.

Installation

Standard installation package

Your install is included in the price of the chargepoint if it meets our standard install criteria. If it doesn't, we'll provide a no obligation quote or a full refund if you don't want to proceed.

Your expert will posotion and fix the charger to the wall and connect to your wifi, making sure it's ready to use.

Demonstration

Your expert will provide a full demonstration of your charger, what the different lights mean and how to get in touch if you have any questions later on.

Finally they'll make sure you know how to find & use public chargepoints in your area and answer any other questions you have about charging.
